title: Authenticating issue (If you're under Comcast post here)
body:
^

Just gonna do a mega thread so there aren't many flooding help.

Others with the same issue and not under Comcast can post as well. Provide your ISP

replies.body: Thanks for trying to help organize!  Everything should be okay now!
I'm still having issues here. NA(Comcast). I boot up the LoL client and attempt to log in. Looks like it keeps churning and i can never actually log in. Any fixes you recommend me trying?
